changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "public"."faq" ( "_prototype" CHARACTER VARYING( 31 ) NOT NULL, "_id" NUMERIC NOT NULL UNIQUE, "answer" CHARACTER VARYING( 2048 ) NOT NULL, "number" INTEGER NOT NULL, "question" CHARACTER VARYING( 2048 ) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY ( "_id" ), CONSTRAINT _prototype_enum CHECK (((_prototype)::text = ANY (ARRAY[('PARENT'::character varying)::text, ('TEACHER'::character varying)::text]))) );
